functions.name: keep_context
functions.description: Saves the current desktop workspace including all open windows, browser tabs, and environment settings

context_name.description: The name to keep this context as

functions.name: restore_context
functions.description: Restores a previously saved workspace with all windows, tabs and settings

context_name.description: The name of the context to restore

functions.name: list_contexts
functions.description: Lists all saved workspaces and contexts with details

functions.name: quick_keep
functions.description: Quickly saves the current workspace with an auto-generated name

functions.name: quick_switch
functions.description: Switches to the most recently saved workspace

functions.name: clear_windows
functions.description: Saves the current workspace then closes all windows for a clean desktop

aggressive.description: Force close applications even if they have unsaved work (use with caution!)

functions.name: minimize_windows
functions.description: Saves the current workspace then minimizes all windows except whitelisted apps

functions.name: add_to_whitelist
functions.description: Add an application to the minimize whitelist so it won't be minimized

app_name.description: The application name or window title pattern to whitelist

functions.name: remove_from_whitelist
functions.description: Remove an application from the minimize whitelist

app_name.description: The application name to remove from whitelist

functions.name: list_whitelist
functions.description: Show all applications in the minimize whitelist

functions.name: clear_history
functions.description: Delete a specific saved workspace/context permanently

context_name.description: The name of the context to delete

functions.name: clear_all_history
functions.description: Delete ALL saved workspaces/contexts permanently - use with caution!
